sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RECEPTACULUM in botany, one of the ſeven parts of fructification, defined by Linnaeus to be the baſe which connects or ſupports the other parts.

RecePîacvlum Chyli, or Pecquet’s Reſervatory, the reſervoir or receptacle for the chyle, fituated in the left fide of the upper vertebra of the loins, under the aorta and the veffels of the left kidney.
